document_data.name: Cult of Reborn Flame
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cult of Reborn Flame''' was a [[primordial]] cult dedicated to [[Achazar|Achazar, the Raging Flame]], that operated out of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|16}} It was the most far-reaching of the primordial cults of the region, and while its headquarters were located in [[Imdolphyn]],{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|33}} and [[Tarmalune]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Stirring the Embers|4}}
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], the Cult of Reborn Flame began to develop a [[ritual]] to try to awaken Achazar from his slumber.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|40-48}} and even the will of Achazar himself.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Pyrophobia|37}}
document_data.Known members:
* [[Inar Venenellin]], also known as Pyrultimus, the leader of the cult.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|5}}
*The [[Firebird (elemental)|Firebird]], an [[elemental]] of [[air]] and [[fire]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|35}}
* [[Bazamarl]], leader of the cell of the cult in Sambral.{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|22}}
